quizzes.question: Type in the keyword used to declare a class:
What is the public keyword called?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Declaring a Class[/h1]

Define all [b]attributes [/b]and [b]behavior [/b](or members) in the body of the class, within curly braces.
You can also define an[b] access specifier[/b] for members of the class.
A member that has been defined using the [b]public [/b]keyword can be accessed from outside the class, as long as it's anywhere within the scope of the class object.
[note]You can also designate a class' members as [b]private [/b]or [b]protected[/b]. This will be discussed in greater detail later in the course.[/note]
